text.div:
Adult Psychosocial Distress Assessment

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    44261-6 Patient Health Questionnaire 9 item (PHQ-9) total score [Reported]
    62746-3 PhenX - general distress screener protocol
    62963-4 PhenX - emotional distress protocol
    70274-6 Generalized anxiety disorder 7 item (GAD-7) total score [Reported.PHQ]
    77820-9 PROMIS short form - emotional distress - anxiety 4a - version 1.0 raw score
    77821-7 PROMIS short form - emotional distress - depression 4a - version 1.0 raw score
    77835-7 PROMIS short form - emotional distress - depression 8b - version 1.0 raw score
    77836-5 PROMIS short form - emotional distress - anxiety 7a - version 1.0 raw score
    77861-3 PROMIS emotional distress - depression - version 1.0 Tscore
    77862-1 PROMIS emotional distress - anxiety - version 1.0 Tscore
